name: REDACTED (Munuxu)
description:
Your company has been hard at work gathering eyewitness reports for the latest spate of monster sightings. 

The general public know something happened, the media want the dirt, and your 'favourite' co-worker has left you in charge of the redaction unit. 

Read through the reports carefully and redact anything that might convince the world that there is something out there - and don't forget to make your company look good in the process.

Or, you know, you're fired.

Trigger warnings: mention of blood, minor violence
